articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Americans have never been so unwilling to relocate for a new job - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Behind the shift in attitudes lies a post-pandemic surge in remote and hybrid positions.
articles.content:
Cant move, wont move. Thats increasingly the approach of Americans who are in the market for a new job.
The Challenger data comes from a survey of over 3,000 job seekers across the country.(pexels)… [+1597 chars]
